snippet: After losing the first three games in the series, the Rangers avoided a sweep by scoring six runs off Yankees relief pitchers.
abstract: Texas Rangers defeat the New York Yankees, 10-6, as New York's bullpen collapses.
lead_paragraph: After losing the first three games in the series, the Rangers avoided a sweep by scoring six runs off Yankees relief pitchers.

headline.seo: Yankees Fall a Bullpen Collapse Short of Sweeping the Rangers
headline.main: Yankees Fall a Bullpen Collapse Short of Sweeping the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Yanks Fall a Bullpen Collapse Short of Sweeping the Rangers
